footer.innovation: All rights reserved. Innovations in AI.

case1.title: Review Management Assistant
case1.description: 100% automatic review categorization, reduced response time to 24 hours, and increased customer satisfaction. Integration with Google/Yandex Maps, App Store, social networks, and website with natural language processing for sentiment, topic, and region analysis.

case2.title: Virtual Online Consultant
case2.description: 10-20% conversion increase, average check growth, and reduced refusals through personalized product selection. Cross-platform compatibility (web, mobile app, Telegram) with access to product catalog, inventory, and promotions for natural query processing.

case3.title: AI Agent for Tech Support
case3.description: 60-80% queries handled without operator involvement, improved satisfaction (CSAT), and 24/7 support without staff growth. CRM and logistics integration for processing queries about order status, returns, bonuses, and working hours via website chat, Telegram, and voice bot.

case4.title: AI Agent for ERP (Logistics)
case4.description: 15-20% write-offs reduction, up to 30% deficit reduction, and 25-35% order accuracy growth. ERP integration with sales history and warehouse, training predictive model by products, regions, and seasons for automatic order formation.

case5.title: AI Assistant for Employee Adaptation
case5.description: 30-50% adaptation time reduction, decreased new employee errors, and 15-20% retention improvement. LMS/HRM system integration for creating bot with step-by-step adaptation, FAQ, and checks with training and progress reports.
